programme.title: Taking Lives
programme.desc: Angelina Jolie plays Illeana Scott, an FBI agent. Her unconventional investigation methods make her the most suitable person to find a serial killer who has been active for two decades in Canada. But, then, he is photographed by the owner of an art gallery (Ethan Hawke) as he commits one of his crimes. The witness helps Illeana to investigate the case, but, at the same time, a deep passion develops between them that might harm the process. Also in the cast are Kiefer Sutherland and Gena Rowlands(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: When their old pal Reuben has a heart attack after being double-crossed by scheming businessman Willie Bank, Danny Ocean's team of gifted grifters reunite to get their own back. Thriller(n)

programme.title: Lucy
programme.desc: Synthetic drugs give a woman superhuman powers, which she uses to strike back against the Asian gangsters who kidnapped her and tried to use her as a mule. In time, her increased intelligence causes her to become disconnected from the rest of humanity(n)

programme.title: The Bucket List
programme.desc: A healthcare tycoon is forced to share his hospital room with a mechanic when both are diagnosed with terminal cancer. The combative pair discover a shared interest in making the most of their remaining time(n)

programme.title: The Maze Runner
programme.desc: A group of amnesiac teenagers awaken in a deadly maze, and search desperately for an escape route while gathering clues that could reveal the reason for their imprisonment. Meanwhile, dreams of a shadowy organisation hint at a sinister agenda(n)

programme.title: Spy
programme.desc: After years of doing work integral to the success of major missions, a deskbound CIA analyst is finally given the chance to go undercover in order to save her missing partner and thwart a global disaster(n)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Most Guys. Spencer counsels Travis, but is distracted by a possible health crisis and a sketchy financial history. Meanwhile, Reggie and Joe try to cheer up Vernon; and Ricky advises Charles to take a stand(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: When their old pal Reuben has a heart attack after being double-crossed by scheming businessman Willie Bank, Danny Ocean's team of gifted grifters reunite to get their own back. Thriller(n)

programme.title: Lucy
programme.desc: Synthetic drugs give a woman superhuman powers, which she uses to strike back against the Asian gangsters who kidnapped her and tried to use her as a mule. In time, her increased intelligence causes her to become disconnected from the rest of humanity(n)

programme.title: Fracture
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins, Ryan Gosling and David Strathairn star in Gregory Hoblit's twist-filled legal drama. When top airplane engineer Ted Crawford discovers that his wife has been cheating on him he takes a devastatingly direct route to revenge: he drives home and shoots his errant spouse in the face. He then waits for the police to turn up and confesses to the crime. With his wife in a coma, Crawford is arrested and enters the justice system. It should, of course, be the simplest prosecution ever. And lawyer Willy Beachum can be forgiven for thinking that his last case as a criminal attorney (before he switches to company law) will be a doddle. But once in court, Crawford, representing himself, starts to tear apart the ample evidence that's stacked against him... Can he possibly get away with his crime? Also starring Rosamund Pike, Billy Burke and Fiona Shaw

programme.title: Frank Miller's Sin City
programme.desc: A collection of interweaving stories all based in the corrupt, crime infested hell-hole that is Basin City. Heavily influenced by film-noir, the main storylines concern a hulking brute called Marv, who is seeking the murderer of a beautiful woman who was killed while asleep in bed with him, a photographer called Dwight who is callously used and seeks revenge, and a soon-to-be-retiring policeman called Hartigan

programme.title: Batman: Under the Red Hood
programme.desc: Diabolical vigilante Red Hood sets out to clean up the streets of Gotham City and destroy Batman. Meanwhile, as Red Hood brutally exterminates the scum of the city, the Joker reappears to taunt Batman in his darkest hour

programme.title: Consenting Adults
programme.desc: A wealthy couple befriend their new neighbours, but do the newcomers have ulterior motives for their friendship? Thriller

programme.title: What Happens in Vegas
programme.desc: Two people discover they've gotten married following a night of debauchery in Vegas, with one of them winning a jackpot after playing the other's quarter. The pair try to undermine each other and get their hands on the money

programme.title: Magnolia
programme.desc: Jason Robards plays Earl Partridge, whose son (Cruise) runs evangelical How To Get Laid seminars. A nurse contacts Cruise and the two come together for an uneasy, cathartic reunion

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: Chaos reigns when a virus starts turning humans into blood-crazed predators. An alternate ending follows the film. Strong language/strong bloody violence/flashing images

programme.title: The Heartbreak Kid
programme.desc: A newlywed man who believes he's just gotten hitched to the perfect woman encounters another lady on his honeymoon

programme.title: Waitress
programme.desc: Trapped in a miserable marriage and blessed with the ability to transform her misery into delicious desserts, a small-town waitress finds her life forever changed by an unplanned pregnancy

programme.title: Get Hard
programme.desc: When a millionaire is convicted of fraud and sentenced to a maximum-security prison, he hires a man he assumes is an ex-con to coach him on surviving incarceration

programme.title: Lady in the Water
programme.desc: In this mesmerizing horror fantasy, an apartment manager finds a sea nymph called a "narf" in the complex's swimming pool, and tries to return her to her natural habitat. However, otherworldly monsters are out to stop him

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: This Little Light. In the Season 1 finale, Kyle and Anderson search Rome for a surprise perpetrator, while Sidney clarifies his intentions

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: Powerful drama about a South African mercenary who teams up with a fisherman to recover a priceless pink diamond amid the civil war and chaos in 1990s Sierra Leone

programme.title: Eastern Promises
programme.desc: (2007) Thriller set in the underworld of London's Russian mafia, directed by David Cronenberg and starring Viggo Mortensen and Naomi Watts. When Anna, a midwife, sets out to discover the truth behind the death of a young prostitute, she finds herself snared in the deadly world of sex trafficking(n)

programme.title: The Pyramid
programme.desc: A team of archaeologists find a lost pyramid unlike any other, buried beneath the Egyptian desert. After excitedly making their way inside, they realise that they're trapped... and they are not alone(n)

programme.title: Evan Almighty
programme.desc: Congressman Evan Baxter is settling into a new life of political importance when God appears and tells him to build an ark. Evan thinks he's going mad, but before long, animals and deliveries of wood persuade him that it might be his destiny to be the modern-day Noah after all(n)

programme.title: Victor Frankenstein
programme.desc: This reimagining of the Frankenstein mythos focuses on Igor (Daniel Radcliffe), the assistant of Victor Frankenstein (James McAvoy). When the mad scientist builds an undead creature that soon becomes a grave danger, it's up to Igor to save Frankenstein from both the monster and himself. Written by Max Landis (Chronicle) and directed by Paul McGuigan(n)

programme.title: Pollock
programme.desc: Portraying one of this century's most influential artists, actor and director Ed Harris goes to extraordinary lengths in giving an accurate image of Jackson Pollock's often troublesome life.Jackson Pollock became America's first "Art Star" and his bold paintings changed the course of modern art. But the torments that plagued his days - perhaps the ones that drove him to paint in the first place - haunted him for his whole life. 'Pollock' won one Oscar and the TFCA Award at the Toronto Film Critics Association Awards, 2001(n)

programme.title: Brokeback Mountain
programme.desc: Over one summer herding sheep in 1963, cowboys Jake and Ennis fall in love. But 60s Wyoming isn't ready for gay cowboys and the two men face up to a lifetime of loneliness and lies(n)

programme.title: Self/less
programme.desc: A dying real-estate tycoon undergoes a top-secret procedure to transfer his consciousness into the body of a healthy young man, but he discovers that his new life isn't what he expected after severing ties to his old one and learning about the mysterious origins of his new body(n)

programme.title: Eagle Eye
programme.desc: Two strangers become pawns in a diabolical plot and must work together to discover what is really happening while trying to prove that they are not terrorists. Shia LaBeouf ("Disturbia") and Michelle Monaghan star in this taut suspense thriller. Michael Chiklis, Rosario Dawson, Billy Bob Thornton. Directed by D.J. Caruso(n)

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: A genetically-engineered assassin finds himself on the run after he is double-crossed on a mission in Russia in this stylized adaptation of the popular video game(n)

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: Agent 47 (Rupert Friend), known only by the barcode tattoo on his neck, is an elite international assassin. Engineered to be an unstoppable killing machine, 47 is contracted by a covert organization to assassinate high-profile targets on a global scale. He's given the assignment to kill the leader of a crime syndicate who wishes to unlock the secrets behind 47's powers and harness that information into an army of highly skilled hit men. As 47 races to complete his mission, new information emerges about his origins and sparks a race against time as the agent is hunted for the secrets behind his skills. Aleksander Bach directs this reboot of the 2007 action thriller Hitman(n)

programme.title: Victor Frankenstein
programme.desc: This reimagining of the Frankenstein mythos focuses on Igor (Daniel Radcliffe), the assistant of Victor Frankenstein (James McAvoy). When the mad scientist builds an undead creature that soon becomes a grave danger, it's up to Igor to save Frankenstein from both the monster and himself. Written by Max Landis (Chronicle) and directed by Paul McGuigan(n)

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: Retired hit man John Wick returns to the fray to punish the New York City gangsters who destroyed his life(n)

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: An Oscar-nominated Will Smith stars as Muhammad Ali in Michael Mann's heavyweight biopic of the boxing icon. Co-starring Jamie Foxx and Jon Voight. (2001)(160 mins)

As 47 races to complete his mission, new information emerges about his origins and sparks a race against time as the agent is hunted for the secrets behind his skills. Aleksander Bach directs this reboot of the 2007 action thriller Hitman(n)

programme.title: Perkins' 14
programme.desc: Dark Ride director Craig Singer returns to the helm with this shocking horror film about a delusional psychopath who creates a unified team of 14 maniacal killers. Produced entirely over the Internet, where writers uploaded story details and actors submitted audition tapes, Perkins' 14 was released into theaters as part of the third After Dark Horror Fest. Ronald Perkins was just six years old when his parents were brutally slaughtered right before his eyes. Unable to overcome the incredible trauma of witnessing such a diabolical event, Perkins becomes convinced that the killers who murdered his parents will eventually return to finish the job they started years ago -- and he plans to be fully prepared to fight back when they do. Years later, when Perkins turns 34, he kidnaps 14 people from his hometown of Stone Cove and sets about reprogramming them to become relentless killing machines. Now, if the killers ever do return, they'll have to get through Perkins' 14 in order to reach their intended target. Trouble is, now that Perkins' 14 are ready for battle, they've become increasingly difficult to contain(n)

programme.title: Victor Frankenstein
programme.desc: This reimagining of the Frankenstein mythos focuses on Igor (Daniel Radcliffe), the assistant of Victor Frankenstein (James McAvoy). When the mad scientist builds an undead creature that soon becomes a grave danger, it's up to Igor to save Frankenstein from both the monster and himself. Written by Max Landis (Chronicle) and directed by Paul McGuigan(n)

programme.title: Stanhope
programme.desc: A teen in New York City gets caught up in crime as he tries to help his mom support the family(n)

programme.title: Bulletproof
programme.desc: An undercover cop is assigned to escort a fugitive to Los Angeles, where his testimony will help put a drug lord behind bars(n)

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Slinky space queen Serleena plots extra-terrestrial destruction and Agent J is going to need help. The only one who knows Serleena's secret is K, who's now a postal official with no knowledge of his former life. Can J persuade a reluctant K to put on the black suit for more alien-busting?(n)

programme.title: Peacock
programme.desc: This riveting psychological drama follows a quiet bank clerk (Cillian Murphy) whose life takes a sharp turn after a train accident exposes his female alter ego and threatens to destroy what remains of his sanity(n)

programme.title: Cop Car
programme.desc: Two rebellious young boys steal a police cruiser and go for a joyride. But when they find a dead body in the trunk, they realize they must evade the car's owner, a corrupt small-town sheriff who's desperate to reclaim his property(n)

programme.title: Kiss the Girls
programme.desc: (1997) Gary Fleder's thriller, based on James Patterson's novel, stars Morgan Freeman in his first outing as forensic psychologist Alex Cross. Called in to track the kidnapper and killer of young girls, he's joined by Dr Kate McTiernan (Ashley Judd), who has escaped the killer's dungeon. The investigation gets personal when his niece Naomi (Gina Ravera) is kidnapped(n)

programme.title: Gone Girl
programme.desc: Man comes under suspicion when his wife disappears(n)

programme.title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
programme.desc: Quirky Coen brothers effort follows Depression-era convicts who escape a Mississippi chain gang and embark on an odyssey to find a hidden treasure. The film is rife with references to Homer's "Odyssey"(n)

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: Two siblings uncover a harrowing secret about their grandparents while spending a week at their remote farm in Pennsylvania(n)

programme.title: Scream 3
programme.desc: In Hollywood, Sidney Prescott must once again confront her demons when the stars of a horror movie sequel based on her life begin to die(n)

programme.title: The Last Witch Hunter
programme.desc: An immortal witch hunter faces off against the Queen Witch who has returned from the dead in a battle where the fate of humanity hangs in the balance(n)

programme.title: House of 1000 Corpses
programme.desc: Heavy-metal rocker Rob Zombie made his directorial debut with this clever homage to horror films of the '70s. Shortly after two couples stop at a roadside museum, they're lured into the lair of a family of psychotics led by a demented matriarch (Karen Black). Sid Haig, Bill Moseley, Sheri Moon(n)

programme.title: Kill the Messenger
programme.desc: Jeremy Renner stars as a journalist who is tormented by a vicious smear campaign after he exposes a CIA scandal. Absorbing biographical drama with Rosemarie DeWitt. (2014)(108 mins)(n)

programme.title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
programme.desc: A fading actor, best known for his portrayal of a superhero, plans a comeback by appearing in a Broadway play in this blisteringly funny showbiz satire. However, his attempts to become more altruistic, rebuild his career and reconnect with friends and family prove more difficult than expected(n)

programme.title: Joe Somebody
programme.desc: After being publicly humiliated by the office bully in front of his daughter on Bring Your Child to Work Day, a divorced office drone gives himself a makeover and starts training for a rematch. But as he unexpectedly begins climbing up the corporate ladder, he realises that he doesn't need revenge to earn his daughter's respect, or to become someone else to win the heart of his co-worker(n)

programme.title: Amazing Grace
programme.desc: In 1797, William Wilberforce, the great crusader for the British abolition of slavery, manoeuvers his way through Parliament, in an attempt to end the British transatlantic slave trade(n)

programme.title: The Place Beyond the Pines
programme.desc: A shiftless bank robber looking to provide for his family crosses paths with an ambitious cop during a heist, changing both of their lives forever(n)

programme.title: End of Days
programme.desc: Fans of Arnold Schwarzenegger will be delighted as Arnie takes on his biggest fight yet...with the Devil himself! Satan, played by Gabriel Byrne, is in town and he has just one thing on his mind - to impregnate a woman with the Devil's spawn before the turn of the Millennium(n)

programme.title: Victor Frankenstein
programme.desc: This reimagining of the Frankenstein mythos focuses on Igor (Daniel Radcliffe), the assistant of Victor Frankenstein (James McAvoy). When the mad scientist builds an undead creature that soon becomes a grave danger, it's up to Igor to save Frankenstein from both the monster and himself. Written by Max Landis (Chronicle) and directed by Paul McGuigan(n)

programme.title: Batman Returns
programme.desc: The world's most enigmatic superhero, Batman, resurfaces for another Gotham City adventure. This time, he's pitted against villainous freak The Penguin and the devious, sexually-charged Catwoman , both of whom are out for revenge against the world which has treated them so cruelly and which Batman seems to represent. These new foes prove more than a match for him both on a professional and a personal level, especially when The Penguin enlists the help of industrialist Max Shreck to run for mayor of Gotham, and when Catwoman takes a sadomasochistic shine to her rubber-suited nemesis(n)

programme.title: Black Rain
programme.desc: Michael Douglas and Andy Garcia are the New York cops hunting a gangland killer through the Osaka underworld. Brutal neon noir directed by Ridley Scott(n)

programme.title: The Water Diviner
programme.desc: In this sweeping epic set in the Australian outback, a father gifted with the power to find water flowing underground fulfills a promise to his wife to locate their sons lost at the battle of Gallipoli(n)

programme.title: A Little Chaos
programme.desc: Alan Rickman directs the romantic drama A Little Chaos, casting Kate Winslet in the lead role of Sabine de Barra, a gifted gardener and landscaper who is chosen to design a section of the elaborate landscaping to be constructed at the palace of Versailles for Louis XIV (Rickman). The job brings with it gender and class barriers, and she must also contend professionally with controlling royal gardener André Le Notre (Matthias Schoenaerts), who begins to fall for the free-spirited de Barra. A Little Chaos screened at the 2014 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: El Cantante
programme.desc: Pop icon Marc Anthony steps into the role of Salsa superstar Hector Lavoe in this biopic that follows the singer from his early career success as a Puerto Rican teen sensation to his later status as a New York City Latin idol while also documenting his ongoing struggle against drug and alcohol addiction. Actress and pop star Jennifer Lopez co-stars as Puchi; Lavoe's longtime muse and love interest(n)

programme.title: Party Girl
programme.desc: Robert Taylor stars in director Nicholas Ray's Party Girl as the traditional Ray anti-hero: a criminal lawyer who's a little bit of both. Fronting for Chicago gang boss Lee J. Cobb during the late 1920s, Taylor manages to get Cobb-underling John Ireland off on a murder rap. Cobb throws a party to celebrate the event at his penthouse, where showgirl Cyd Charisse performs a sexy dance. Ireland has the hots for Charisse, but she's more interested in Taylor. Thanks to her good influence, Taylor decides to quit the rackets. But after agreeing to take one more case for Cobb, Taylor is wounded in a shoot-out and hauled before prosecutor Kent Smith. Smith orders Taylor to testify against Cobb; the lawyer agrees to do so provided that Charisse is given police protection. Unfortunately, Cobb gets to Charisse first and threatens to throw acid in her lovely face while Taylor watches helplessly

programme.title: Tension
programme.desc: Gripping thriller with Richard Basehart starring as Warren Quimby, a pharmacist whose plot to murder his wife's lover is spoilt when someone else kills the man. The police inspector investigating the case believes Quimby is responsible, though, and starts applying pressure to try and make him crack

programme.title: The Unfinished Dance
programme.desc: An aspiring ballerina begins following a prima ballerina hoping that she will become her replacement. Unfortunately, another dancer is chosen, causing the determined twinkle-toes to cause a little accident to destroy the usurper's career. It works and the hapless ballerina's career is destroyed. In the end, the conniving one atones for her treachery and the two become fast friends. Danny Thomas makes his feature film debut in this musical

programme.title: The White Cliffs of Dover
programme.desc: An American military nurse struggles with circumstance, class differences and World War I as she strives to marry her British love. Years later, she struggles once again as her son serves in World War II

programme.title: Killer Shark
programme.desc: Yarn about a collegian (Roddy McDowall) and his misadventures amid the fishing fleets of Baja California. Maria: Laurette Luez. White: Roland Winters. Ramon: Edward Norris. Agapito: Rick Vallin. Jonesy: Dick Moore

programme.title: Kidnapped
programme.desc: For his first independent production, former child star Roddy McDowall selected the tried-and-true Robert Louis Stevenson classic Kidnapped. McDowall reserves the plum role of David Balfour for himself, while Dan O'Herlihy, McDowall's costar in Orson Welles' MacBeth, is cast as Scottish patriot Alan Breck. The story is the familiar one about a young man (McDowall) cheated out of his birthright by his wicked, covetous uncle (Houseley Stevenson). Kidnapped and sold into slavery, Balfour escapes and makes his way back to Scotland, where he befriends the swashbuckling Breck and the lovely Aileen (Sue England). Several exciting adventures later, Balfour returns to his ancestral home to settle accounts with his uncle. Laid low by threadbare production values, Kidnapped is one of lesser screen adaptations of Robert Louis Stevenson's novel, though at least it's more faithful to the source than the 1938 20th Century-Fox version

programme.title: The Third Day
programme.desc: In this melodrama, a man crashes his car beside a river and loses his memory. During the next three days, his memory begins to return, and few of the memories are pleasant. His wife is ready to leave him, and his cousin wants the family china-manufacturing business for himself

programme.title: The Cool Ones
programme.desc: This musical comedy tells of the romantic travails of two popular singers thrust together by an ingenious promoter/matchmaker. The young male needs to revive his flagging career, while the female singer is trying to get her big break; so both of them go along with their manager's hare-brained publicity stunt

programme.title: Holiday in Mexico
programme.desc: The daughter of the American ambassador to Mexico plays matchmaker for her widowed father, while he attempts to get her to switch her amorous feelings from an older pianist to the son of a British ambassador

programme.title: Lord Love a Duck
programme.desc: A satirical black comedy with McDowall successfully playing a high-school senior, even though he was in his late thirties at the time! The story concerns a brilliant but unbalanced young man, who makes it his business to get the girl he has designs on everything she wants, whatever the cost

programme.title: My Friend Flicka
programme.desc: A ranching family allows their son to train a filly named Flicka in this adaptation of Mary O'Hara's novel

programme.title: Lassie Come Home
programme.desc: The first - and considered by many to be the best - of the famous sequence of canine adventure films, with Elizabeth Taylor and Roddy McDowall as the youngsters fighting to return the plucky collie dog to her rightful home

programme.title: How Green Was My Valley
programme.desc: An account of early 20th-century life with a hard-working, fun-loving family in a Welsh coal-mining village, where they deal with love, death, union strikes and bullying

programme.title: Cleopatra
programme.desc: Monumentally epic in every sense of the word, Joseph L Mankiewicz's expensive and controversial remake of the DeMille 1934 original charts the 18 years leading up to the formation of the Roman Empire, from Cleopatra's first meeting with Julius Caesar to her (rather drawn out) death alongside Mark Anthony(n)

programme.title: Bedevilled
programme.desc: A divinity student (Steve Forrest) shelters a fugitive (Anne Baxter) in this suspense tale. Directed by Mitchell Leisen. Filmed in Paris(n)

programme.title: Angel on My Shoulder
programme.desc: Satirical drama about a murdered convict who returns to Earth after making a deal with the Devil. In return for revenge on the gangster who killed him, the murdered man agrees to occupy the body of a saintly judge. However, although the Devil keeps his part of the bargain, he is powerless to do anything when the deceased convict embarks upon a process of moral reformation(n)

programme.title: The Fighting Sullivans
programme.desc: Five brothers from Iowa survive together throughout the Great Depression, and later serve together in the Pacific theater in World War II, where their acts of bravery and courage become known(n)

programme.title: Season of Passion
programme.desc: Two Australian sugar-cane cutters head to Sydney for their annual reconnection with their seasonal sweethearts only to discover things have changed since they last got together(n)

programme.title: I Confess
programme.desc: Gritty Hitchcock thriller with Montgomery Clift as the priest who is torn between betraying the sanctity of his confessional and the murder of a lawyer, for which he is the prime suspect(n)

programme.title: The Blue Gardenia
programme.desc: A woman finds herself accused of murdering the stranger she went home with in this film noir. Knowing only that the killer, who beat the man to death with a poker, is a woman, a reporter posts an open plea for the murderess to turn herself in. Though innocent of killing the man, the woman decides to respond to the ad, calling herself a friend of the accused. She and the reporter meet each other at the Blue Gardenia several times and gradually fall in love. Believing her to be guilty, the reporter urges her to confess. But then the real killer shows up and all ends happily for the lovers(n)

programme.title: Carnival Story
programme.desc: A melodramatic tale of love, greed, infidelity and murder set against the backdrop of a carnival in Germany. A young female pickpocket becomes romantically involved with a circus barker before transferring her allegiances to a high-diver - one of the show's star acts. But she reckons without the ruthlessness of the barker(n)

programme.title: The North Star
programme.desc: Made in answer to President Roosevelt's call for Hollywood to pay tribute to the Soviet wartime allies, Lewis Milestone's film, scripted by Lillian Hellman, tells of the exploits of a Ukrainian farming collective overrun by the Nazi invasion. A group of young people, including Marina Pavlova and Damian Simonov (Farley Granger), are on a walking holiday and separated from the farming village but, led by Old Karp, they manage to smuggle a wagon-load of guns into the occupied village and lead the uprising against the Nazis, led by Col Harden. The film was nominated for five Oscars, but its makers were called before the 1950s McCarthy hearings, and, at the height of the Cold War, a version shorn of 22 minutes of pro-Soviet references was released as Armored Attack!(n)

programme.title: All About Eve
programme.desc: Margo Channing is the ageing star who employs ambitious young Eve Harrington to shore up her fragile ego. But the starlet wants everything Margo has and is determined to get it(n)

programme.title: Swamp Water
programme.desc: Jean Renoir's tale of Georgia's Okefenokee swamp and the people who inhabit it. Anne Baxter. Ben: Dana Andrews. Tom: Walter Brennan. Tim: Ward Bond. Thursday: Walter Huston. Hannah: Mary Howard. Mabel: Virginia Gilmore. Jesse: John Carradine. Powerful romantic melodrama. Colorful(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Help Me. Tommy goes gunning for the culprit who tried to kill him; Greg pressures Ruiz to give up the "Ghost," as Angela tries to keep them at bay. Meanwhile, Proctor brings a new problem to the fore for Ghost to deal with

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Photoshoot. Media-consultant Missy deals with fallout from a suspect decision at Cam's photo shoot; Chen and Cassie deal with their long-distance relationship via technology

programme.title: Into the Grizzly Maze
programme.desc: In this suspenseful thriller, two brothers trek into the Alaskan wilderness to pay their respects to their late father, but things go awry when grizzly bears begin mysteriously fleeing their nearby habitat. Joined by a tracker, the siblings realize their safety is in jeopardy and they are being hunted by a large bear

programme.title: Thelma & Louise
programme.desc: Susan Sarandon and Geena Davis star in Ridley Scott's feminist road movie where what starts of as an impromptu weekend holiday sees them become fugitives on the run. They head for Mexico, chased by the police headed by Harvey Keitel who becomes increasingly sympathetic to their plight and their eventual fate

programme.title: Foxcatcher
programme.desc: Docudrama about millionaire John du Pont (Steve Carell) and his relationship with brothers Dave (Mark Ruffalo) and Mark Schultz (Channing Tatum), Olympic gold-medal wrestlers who train at his estate. Mark initially idolizes du Pont, but slowly realizes the depths of his benefactor's madness. Moneyball's Bennett Miller directed from a script by E. Max Frye and Dan Futterman

programme.title: The Peacemaker
programme.desc: A pair of mismatched government operatives must recover stolen nuclear warheads from international terrorists. When missiles being transported on a Russian train are supposedly destroyed, a brash army specialist is teamed with an ambitious female executive. They soon learn a grudging respect, as the hunt for the weapons takes them across Europe and culminates in a tense Manhattan showdown

programme.title: Into the Grizzly Maze
programme.desc: In this suspenseful thriller, two brothers trek into the Alaskan wilderness to pay their respects to their late father, but things go awry when grizzly bears begin mysteriously fleeing their nearby habitat. Joined by a tracker, the siblings realize their safety is in jeopardy and they are being hunted by a large bear

programme.title: The Edge
programme.desc: When billionaire Charles Morse travels with his wife and her favourite photographer, Robert Green, to Alaska for a fashion shoot, Morse and Green become stranded in the wilderness, pursued by an enormous and terrifying bear

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Help Me. Tommy goes gunning for the culprit who tried to kill him; Greg pressures Ruiz to give up the "Ghost," as Angela tries to keep them at bay. Meanwhile, Proctor brings a new problem to the fore for Ghost to deal with

programme.desc: The Photoshoot. Media-consultant Missy deals with fallout from a suspect decision at Cam's photo shoot; Chen and Cassie deal with their long-distance relationship via technology

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: Martin Lawrence stars in this slam-dunk of a family-friendly sports fable as a self-absorbed college basketball coach whose public meltdown forces him to seek redemption by mentoring a team of junior-high misfits. Wendy Raquel Robinson, Horatio Sanz, Breckin Meyer, Patrick Warburton, Megan Mullally, Oren Williams, Eddy Martin, Tara Correa

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In a world where the dinosaurs never went extinct, a young Apatosaurus is swept away by a vicious river current and ends up far from home. He soon embarks on a journey to reunite with his family, and befriends a prehistoric human child along the way

programme.title: The Fifth Element
programme.desc: A 23rd-century New York City cabbie encounters a genetically engineered alien named Leeloo, who has the life force that can unite the planet's elements and stave off a raging fireball that's on a collision course with Earth

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Photoshoot. Media-consultant Missy deals with fallout from a suspect decision at Cam's photo shoot; Chen and Cassie deal with their long-distance relationship via technology(n)

programme.title: Kiss of Death
programme.desc: A loyal family man who has had trouble with the law is released from prison on the condition that he help the government spy on Little Junior, a major crime lord. This noirish thriller follows the ex-con's efforts to befriend the crime boss and keep his identity as an informant secret(n)

programme.title: Ricki and the Flash
programme.desc: An ageing rocker returns home to her estranged family after years on the road following her dreams, and must face the music as she tries to make things right with her loved ones(n)

programme.title: The Diary of a Teenage Girl
programme.desc: In this poignant adaptation of author Phoebe Gloeckner's acclaimed graphic novel of the same name, Minnie Goetze (Bel Powley), a sexually precocious teenage girl living in 1970s San Francisco tries to grasp the connection between sex and love after she seduces her bohemian mother's boyfriend (Alexander Skarsgård). Her newly awakened sexuality manifests itself in a series of encounters with boys at school which she painstakenly recounts her diary. Kristen Wiig, Christopher Meloni, Austin Lyon and Quinn Nagle co-star. Directed by Marielle Heller(n)

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: After Batman Begins, director Christopher Nolan and star Christian Bale work together once again, in this mystery thriller set in nineteenth century London. Magician Robert Angier (Hugh Jackman) lost his beloved wife accidentally during a performance. He blames his friend, also magician Alfred Borden for her death and they become enemies. Their intense rivalry will lead to a life-long battle for supremacy, with deadly consequences(n)

programme.title: Philadelphia
programme.desc: Hotshot lawyer Andrew Beckett takes his firm to court when he is sacked shortly after the partners discover he has AIDS(n)

programme.title: Extinction
programme.desc: A man and his daughter hide from zombies, which have taken over the world following a viral outbreak. They feel safer when cold weather wipes out most of the creatures, but soon discover that a few of them have adapted to their new environment(n)

programme.title: Ricki and the Flash
programme.desc: An ageing rocker returns home to her estranged family after years on the road following her dreams, and must face the music as she tries to make things right with her loved ones(n)

programme.title: 40 Days and 40 Nights
programme.desc: After breaking up a relationship, good-looking Matt Sullivan (Josh Hartnett) decides to test himself and intends to endure 40 days and 40 nights of total sexual abstinence. What seemed difficult becomes almost impossible when he meets and becomes infatuated with Erica Sutton (Shannyn Sossamon, of A Knight's Tale ). To make matters worse, his friends are perplexed and make bets on how long the youngster can resist(n)

programme.desc: The Photoshoot. Media-consultant Missy deals with fallout from a suspect decision at Cam's photo shoot; Chen and Cassie deal with their long-distance relationship via technology

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher
programme.desc: Gerard Butler stars in Marc Forster's violent, fact-based drama about a substance-addicted criminal who finds God and relocates to Sudan to offer his own idiosyncratic brand of Christian charity. The film initially portrays Sam Childers as being a far from nice man: a misogynistic biker whose life is steeped in crime, narcotics and violence, and who quickly returns to armed robbery almost as soon as he's released from jail. But while he was inside, his wife Lynn found Jesus, and, after Sam gets stabbed, she urges him to join her at church. Sam subsequently has his own Damascene moment and starts life afresh, founding his own (legitimate) construction company. Before long he has also built his own church. But it's only after a trip to Sudan, where he witnesses the devastation wrought by the marauding Lord's Resistance Army, that he truly becomes driven. Relocating to the African country, he sets up a faith-based centre to care for victims of the LRA's violence and rape. And also takes up arms to literally fight the good fight... Also starring Michael Shannon

programme.title: About a Boy
programme.desc: Adaptation of the Nick Hornby novel about the friendship that develops between a bright but awkward 12-year-old boy and a wayward thirtysomething man masquerading as a lone parent in a bid to seduce single mothers. Ironically, it is the boy who initiates the bachelor into the world of adult responsibility and meaningful relationships as the bond between them deepens

programme.title: Snow Dogs
programme.desc: Cuba Gooding Jr. plays Ted, a young odontologist living in Miami who, one day, receives an inheritance. It all sounds very tempting until he goes to Alaska to collect it. What he receives is… a pack of eight sled dogs, who make his life impossible. Once he has grown fond of the toothed little creatures, he must confront Thunder Jack, the most rustic highlander in the area, who plans to leave him without the canine prize. A fast white comedy, more than recommendable when looking for one of those films to entertain children, parents and grandparents at the same time

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Emotions run wild in the mind of a young girl who is uprooted from her peaceful life in the Midwest and forced to move to San Francisco. Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness each have their own ideas about how she should handle her new surroundings

programme.title: What's the Worst That Could Happen?
programme.desc: This polished caper comedy, based on a Donald E. Westlake novel, pits a professional thief (Martin Lawrence) against the white-collar criminal (Danny DeVito) who stole a prized ring from him. The topnotch supporting cast includes John Leguizamo as Lawrence's partner in crime and comedian Bernie Mac as Lawrence's fence, Uncle Jack. Carmen Ejogo, Glenne Headly, William Fichtner, Larry Miller

programme.title: Out of Sight
programme.desc: An unlikely romance develops between a charming bank robber and a beautiful federal marshal after his escape from prison---but they once again find themselves on opposite sides of the law when the police learn of a diamond heist planned by the fugitive and his colorful partners in crime. Based on the novel by Elmore Leonard. George Clooney, Jennifer Lopez, Ving Rhames, Don Cheadle

programme.title: Irrational Man
programme.desc: Nothing can snap a philosophy professor (Joaquin Phoenix) out of a mental funk, except for a student (Emma Stone) whose presence offers a breath of fresh air

programme.title: About a Boy
programme.desc: Adaptation of the Nick Hornby novel about the friendship that develops between a bright but awkward 12-year-old boy and a wayward thirtysomething man masquerading as a lone parent in a bid to seduce single mothers. Ironically, it is the boy who initiates the bachelor into the world of adult responsibility and meaningful relationships as the bond between them deepens

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: Moving to China with his mum, young Dre Parker is bullied by the local kids until martial arts master Mr Han teaches him how to fight back

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part II
programme.desc: Sequel finds Mr. Miyagi going back to his homeland of Okinawa for a reunion with the sensei's dying father, taking Daniel with him. This tearful good-bye also reopens old wounds, as a karate expert and former friend of Miyagi's named Sato has never forgiven him for a decades-old slight

programme.title: The Rookie
programme.desc: Coach Dennis Quaid makes a deal with his school baseball team: if they win the cup, he'll try out for the major league. Stirring real life sports drama

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: The work of international superstar Stephen Chow, Kung Fu Hustle is a humorous, special-effects-filled, action-packed martial arts epic set in early '40s China. A bumbling thief named Sing (Stephen Chow) desires to be the toughest member of the dreaded gangster hit squad known as The Axe Gang, but to completely join the gang he has to commit murder. When Sing attempts to rob a crowded run-down apartment complex known as Pig Sty Alley, the locals begin to defend themselves with some high-flying kung fu skills, and a tiny war erupts between the local masters and the axe-wielding gang. After the gang busts the ancient kung fu king known as The Beast (Leung Siu Lung) out of jail, tensions reach a boiling point as Pig Sty Alley's landlady (Yuen Qiu) leads an all-out attack against the gang and Sing discovers his true heroic fate. Kung Fu Hustle, which set box-office records across Asia during its December 2004 release, also stars Yuen Wah and Xing Yu, and features fight choreography by legendary masters of martial arts cinema Yuen Woo Ping and Sammo Hung(n)

programme.title: The Remaining
programme.desc: The Rapture disrupts a wedding, leaving the terrified survivors to face a fate far worse than death(n)

programme.title: The Peacemaker
programme.desc: A pair of mismatched government operatives must recover stolen nuclear warheads from international terrorists. When missiles being transported on a Russian train are supposedly destroyed, a brash army specialist is teamed with an ambitious female executive. They soon learn a grudging respect, as the hunt for the weapons takes them across Europe and culminates in a tense Manhattan showdown(n)

programme.title: Regarding Henry
programme.desc: Harrison Ford as a lawyer recovering from a shooting that has left him brain damaged. Annette Bening. Bradley: Bill Nunn. Rachel: Mikki Allen. Charlie: Donald Moffat. Mrs. O'Brien: Nancy Marchand. Rosella: Aida Linares. Jessica: Elizabeth Wilson. Phyllis: Robin Bartlett. Bruce: Bruce Altman. Directed by Mike Nichols(n)

programme.title: Still Alice
programme.desc: Linguistics professor Alice Howland finds her relationships with her husband and three children tested when she is diagnosed with early-onset Alzheimer's disease(n)

programme.title: Witness
programme.desc: Harrison Ford gives a career-best performance as the cop forced into hiding in an Amish village to protect a witness. Oscar-winning crime thriller with Kelly McGillis(n)

programme.title: Office Space
programme.desc: Peter Gibbons (Ron Livingston) is a computer programmer working for Initech in Houston. Every day, he and his friends Samir (Ajay Naidu) and Michael Bolton (David Herman as not THAT Michael Bolton), suffer endless indignities and humiliations in their soulless workspace from their soulless boss, Bill Lumbergh (Gary Cole). For Peter, stuck in his cookie-cutter apartment with paper-thin walls and IKEA furniture, every day is worse than the one before it -- so every day is the worst of his life. To cap it off, Initech has hired a pair of "efficiency experts" to downsize the company. One Friday night, Peter's soon to be ex-girlfriend Anne (Alexandra Wentworth) forces him to go to an occupational hypnotherapist to relieve work stress. While Peter is under hypnosis, the therapist keels over and dies. As he never snaps out of his hypnotic state, Peter has a new outlook on life. If something annoys him, he just ignores it or walks away from it. He is completely relaxed and enjoying life for the first time in a long time. On Monday, Peter skips work and sleeps in. He gets up for lunch and drives down to a restaurant next to his office and asks the waitress he's had a crush on, Joanna (Jennifer Aniston), on a date. When Peter stops into the office to pick up his organizer, he's called in to talk to the efficiency experts. Relaxed and friendly, Peter charms them as he describes everything wrong with the office, including his boss. Even as Peter now appears at work only as the mood strikes him, the experts decide he's management material and give him a promotion even as they lay off the hardworking Samir and Michael. Peter then convinces his friends to exact revenge on Initech based upon an idea from Superman III. Not everything works out quite as planned. Office Space originated from writer/director Mike Judge's first animated short of the same name, created in 1991. The short was about Milton (reproduced in the film by Stephen Root), a damaged office drone whose complaints and threats about his sufferings go unheeded(n)

programme.title: The Lady in the Van
programme.desc: A homeless woman parks her van in the driveway of playwright Alan Bennett's house and lives there for 15 years. Over the course of her stay, the two form a unique friendship(n)

programme.title: The Rookie
programme.desc: Coach Dennis Quaid makes a deal with his school baseball team: if they win the cup, he'll try out for the major league. Stirring real life sports drama(n)

programme.title: Still Alice
programme.desc: Linguistics professor Alice Howland finds her relationships with her husband and three children tested when she is diagnosed with early-onset Alzheimer's disease(n)

programme.title: Regarding Henry
programme.desc: Harrison Ford as a lawyer recovering from a shooting that has left him brain damaged. Annette Bening. Bradley: Bill Nunn. Rachel: Mikki Allen. Charlie: Donald Moffat. Mrs. O'Brien: Nancy Marchand. Rosella: Aida Linares. Jessica: Elizabeth Wilson. Phyllis: Robin Bartlett. Bruce: Bruce Altman. Directed by Mike Nichols(n)

programme.title: Witness
programme.desc: Harrison Ford gives a career-best performance as the cop forced into hiding in an Amish village to protect a witness. Oscar-winning crime thriller with Kelly McGillis(n)

programme.title: Rain Man
programme.desc: Oscar-winning drama with Tom Cruise as a self-centred career man who discovers that he has autistic older brother(n)

programme.title: The Midnight Meat Train
programme.desc: Japanese director Ryuhei Kitamura ("Versus") makes his Hollywood debut with a literate, suitably grisly adaptation of Clive Barker's short story. A photographer (Bradley Cooper) becomes obsessed with a serial killer (Vinnie Jones) who stalks the subways. Leslie Bibb, Brooke Shields

programme.title: Buffalo '66
programme.desc: Actor Vincent Gallo (The Funeral, Palookaville) made his feature directorial debut with this drama about convict Billy Brown (Gallo), released after half a decade spent behind bars. Drifting into downtown Buffalo, Billy kidnaps teen Layla (Christina Ricci) and has her pose as his loving wife when he visits his parents (Ben Gazzara and Anjelica Huston). Layla praises him and goes along with his fanciful tale that they met at CIA headquarters, where they both worked. Mom and dad not only fall for this, they are entranced by Layla, who soon begins to embellish her act. When she claims to be pregnant by Billy, he hustles her out to a bowling alley and on to a restaurant, where they run into trampy Wendy (Rosanna Arquette), who might be Billy's former girlfriend. Eventually, Billy seems ready to track down and kill the person he feels was responsible for his five years in the slammer. Shown at the 1998 Sundance Film Festival

programme.title: The Crime of Padre Amaro
programme.desc: Nominated for a Best Foreign Language Film Oscar, this controversial and powerful story stars Gael Garcia Bernal as a newly ordained priest who struggles with his conscience after he discovers a corrupt church bureaucracy and falls for a parishioner. Sancho Gracia, Ana Claudia Talancon, Damian Alcazar

programme.title: Freetown
programme.desc: A group of Liberian missionaries seek asylum from a brutal civil war. To reach religious and personal freedom, they must travel across their war-torn country while evading rebels out to kill one of their own

programme.title: Merchants of Doubt
programme.desc: This provocative documentary spotlights scientists who are hired by special-interest groups to cast doubt on hotly debated issues, such as climate change, tobacco use and damage from toxic chemicals

programme.title: Marie Antoinette
programme.desc: Sofia Coppola's opulent and revisionist biopic of the teenage Austrian princess who married France's Louis XVI

programme.title: Manhattan
programme.desc: A writer toys with quiting his job; leaving his current wife; and committing to his teenage girlfriend. Meanwhile, he is falling for his best friend's mate; and his lesbian ex-wife has written a tell-all book

programme.title: Big Fish
programme.desc: In this disarming fantasy told largely through flashbacks, young reporter William Bloom attempts to learn more about his dying father by finding the truth behind a lifetime of his fanciful tall tales and legends of epic proportions

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: In this drama based on a true story, tightrope walker Philippe Petit crosses back and forth between the Twin Towers in 1974. Petit works to accomplish this feat while dealing with logistical problems and the concern of his loved ones

programme.title: Marie Antoinette
programme.desc: Sofia Coppola's opulent and revisionist biopic of the teenage Austrian princess who married France's Louis XVI

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Through a Glass, Darkly. In the Season 2 premiere, Jamie and Claire arrive in France, where they hope to infiltrate the Jacobite rebellion and put a stop to the Battle of Culloden. Thrown into the plush world of French society, they experience court intrigue and struggle to make any headway politically

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Not in Scotland Anymore. In Paris, Jamie struggles to deal with his past, and a fortuitous encounter with Prince Charles affords him promising opportunities, but the Duke of Sandringham's presence complicates matters

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Useful Occupations and Deceptions. Political machinations dominate most of Jamie's time, while Claire puts her healing skills to use. Their plan to stop Culloden moves along, but the forward momentum is jeopardised by past actions

programme.desc: In this deliciously dark horror drama, a priest named Sang-Hyun (Song Kang-ho) becomes a vampire after testing a new vaccine. programme.desc: This Oscar-winning Best Documentary combines interviews, archival footage, photos and re-creations to tell the story of daredevil Philippe Petit, who walked on a high-wire between the twin towers of the World Trade Center in New York in 1974(n)

programme.title: Biutiful
programme.desc: Dignified criminal and caring family man Uxbal works to put his affairs in order after being diagnosed with a terminal illness, only to realise that few of the people around him have any sense of personal responsibility(n)

programme.desc: This hilariously disturbing anthology film includes six tales of revenge, which feature a road-rage incident, a wedding gone wrong and a plane hijacking(n)

programme.desc: A romantic film about food and desire. When her mother forbids her youngest daughter from marrying, her passions are transferred to the food while her true love chooses to marry her sister to be near her(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Untimely Resurrection. Jamie and Claire reunite and attempt to extinguish the fires, but Claire undertakes an unexpected change of course and their relationship is put to the test by a past event that comes back to haunt them(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Best Laid Schemes... Claire's medical knowledge is used to devise a plan to halt a deal that would fill the war chest, but she learns Jamie has reneged on his word, and that leads to problems for both of them(n)

When she does, the pair are pursued back to the real world by 'toon detective Brad Pitt

programme.title: I Heart Huckabees
programme.desc: David O. Russell co-wrote and directed this wild, wacky and wonderful farce that examines the multifaceted fallout of an environmentalist's existential crisis, suffered while battling a giant department store's dubious intentions. Jason Schwartzman, Jude Law, Dustin Hoffman, Lily Tomlin, Naomi Watts, Mark Wahlberg, Isabelle Huppert, Ger Duany, Kevin Dunn

programme.title: First Monday in October
programme.desc: Based on a Broadway play by Jerome Lawrence and Robert E. Lee, conservative Ruth Loomis (Jill Clayburgh) becomes the first woman to be appointed to the United States Supreme Court, much to the dismay of liberal justice Dan Snow (Walter Matthau). Oddly enough, the appointment of Sandra Day O'Connor as the first woman justice of the Supreme Court occurred the same year that First Monday in October was released

programme.title: Agent Cody Banks
programme.desc: High school student Cody is a pint-sized CIA agent whose only flaw is that he's tongue-tied with girls. And his next mission is to cosy up to a top scientist's gorgeous daughter

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic cartoon. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbours Barney and Betty Rubble adopt a child, much to the dismay of Fred's mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Fred being promoted while Barney is left in the dole queue

programme.desc: Santa's oversized helper Will Ferrell goes to New York to find his real dad, only to discover he's a mean old grouch(n)

programme.desc: A 14-year-old girl studying to become a violinist sets up an unusual and lucrative business - for 50 cents, she will listen to someone's secrets, and offer advice on how to make sure no one else finds out. But keeping what she learns under wraps is harder than expected, and the arrival of a new family in the neighbourhood complicates matters further(n)

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Santa's oversized helper Will Ferrell goes to New York to find his real dad, only to discover he's a mean old grouch(n)

programme.title: Roger Dodger
programme.desc: Roger Swanson is a cynical advertising copywriter with a razor-sharp wit who believes he's the modern casanova. But Roger's seemingly foolproof world of smooth talk and casual sex begins to unravel when he is dumped by the beautiful and confident Joyce who also happens to be his boss. To complicate his life further his teenage nephew Nick suddenly appears. Determined to loose his virginity Nick wants Roger to teach him all about seducing women. Welcoming the challenge, Roger guides Nick through the city's wild nightlife for an all-night crash course, only to realize that he--the adult--still has something to learn about what women, and men, really want. Awarded at Venice Film Festival as well as Tribecca Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Back to School
programme.desc: Comedy about a millionaire who goes back to college with his son to show him why and how he should experience the student lifestyle, by throwing the best parties and knowing the right people(n)

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Santa's oversized helper Will Ferrell goes to New York to find his real dad, only to discover he's a mean old grouch(n)

programme.title: Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is a well-meaning but not especially bright fellow with a gift for making the worst of any situation who is about to be fired from his job as a guard at an art gallery for sleeping on the job, but the Chairman intervenes at the last moment(n)

programme.title: Back to School
programme.desc: Comedy about a millionaire who goes back to college with his son to show him why and how he should experience the student lifestyle, by throwing the best parties and knowing the right people(n)

programme.title: Kite
programme.desc: A young woman hunts for her parent's killer, only to become a relentless assassin in a corrupt society where crime and gangs rule the streets

programme.title: This Christmas
programme.desc: Upon gathering together under one roof for the first time in seven years, an estranged family celebrating Christmas rediscovers long-forgotten bonds in this holiday family reuniondrama starring Delroy Lindo, Regina King, and Mekhi Phifer

programme.title: Death Hunt
programme.desc: Adventure set in the Canadian wilderness about a tough mountie on the trail of a trapper he believes to be guilty of murder. The trapper is innocent, but he refuses to be brought in and uses all of his survival skills and resources to evade capture

programme.title: A Rage in Harlem
programme.desc: Bill Duke directs this quirky film adaptation of Chester Himes' crime novel -- a heavily plotted gangster tale with a sweet love story hidden underneath. The film begins in Natchez, Mississippi in 1956. During a police shoot-out with the mob leader Slim's (Badja Djola) gang, Slim's moll Imabelle (Robin Givens) takes off with a cadre of stolen gold. As a result, Imabelle is chased by Slim's mob from Mississippi to New York. By the time she reaches Harlem, she is broke and has to figure out a way to ditch the trunk full of gold. She finds herself at the annual Undertaker's Ball, where she sees the big and dumb Jackson (Forest Whitaker), a bumbling undertaker's assistant. She spots Jackson as a mark that she can use as a cover and latches onto him immediately. She moves in with him to hide out, but Imabelle becomes taken with his innocence. For his part, Jackson falls head over heels in love with her. But the Mississippi mob catches up with her and takes her away. Jackson calls in his street-wise brother Goldy (Gregory Hines) to help him rescue Imabelle. Jackson fears that Imabelle has been kidnapped. But Goldy knows better -- he still agrees to help him but Goldy wants the gold for himself

programme.title: The Cave
programme.desc: (2005) Bruce Hunt's horror film, set in Romania, begins with a prologue in which a group of treasure hunters break into a blocked cave beneath a church. They become entombed and discover the terrible truth of why the cave was sealed centuries before... Thirty years later, a team led by cave diver Jack (Cole Hauser), his brother Tyler (Eddie Cibrian) and scientist Nicolai (Marcel Iures) force their way in to the same cave and descend into a labyrinth of passages and rivers in the search for species unknown to man. But waiting in the dark is a species that feasts on human flesh... ; HD Wide

programme.title: Hard Time
programme.desc: Detective Logan McQueen and long time partner, Charles Duffy, stumble onto a drug deal and decide to intervene. Logan, who is fit, trim and in his mid-50's takes off after three young thugs, Catarato, Chu Chu and Pepe. They have just snatched a bag full of money that was a pay off from drug lord, Conrad Martin, on its way to an unknown recipient. Duffy, who is overweight, in his 60s and just a few weeks from retirement, can't keep up with his partner

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
programme.desc: Sci-fi sequel. In the future, machines rule the Earth, but people are fighting back, so a supercomputer seeks to destroy humankind by sending a virtually indestructible cyborg back in time to kill the human resistance leader in his youth. The boy and his mother, aided by another cyborg, try to alter the events that led to the supercomputer's creation and the subsequent nuclear war

programme.title: In My Country
programme.desc: Langston Whitfield is an African-American journalist who is assigned to cover the South African Truth and Reconciliation Commission hearings by The Washington Post; Whitfield doubts the efficacy of this process, and sets out to interview Col. De Jager, a notorious former officer of the South African police who was famous for his violence against blacks, in order to put this method to the test

programme.title: In the Mix
programme.desc: R&B singer Usher stars in Ron Underwood's crime caper as Darrell, a DJ who, through a series of coincidences, ends up bodyguard to Dolly, daughter of Mafia mobster Frank. As the bullets fly, Darrell finds he's not only protecting Dolly, but also Frank and himself!

programme.title: The Ghost and the Darkness

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: Gripping conspiracy thriller. After an assassination attempt on the American President (William Hurt) during a meeting of world leaders in Salamanca, a secret service agent attempts to piece together who was responsible. Each time a little more is revealed about what really happened, with a new twist just when you think you have it all figured out(n)

programme.title: Buddy

programme.title: Bridge to Terabithia
programme.desc: From the producers of The Lion, the Witch, and the Wardrobe and the mind of author Katherine Paterson comes a rousing fantasy adventure about family, friendship, and the wondrous power of imagination. A perpetual outsider both at home and at school, Jess Aarons (Josh Hutcherson) just never seems to fit in no matter how hard he tries. When his goal to become the fastest runner in middle school is unexpectedly thwarted by newly arrived classmate Leslie Burke (AnnaSophia Robb), who enters in an "all boys" race and leaves her competitors in the dust, Jess soon strikes up a friendship with the imaginative outsider. Their bond is soon cemented thanks to Leslie's love for storytelling and Jess' skill as an artist, and the two lonely kids create a secret kingdom called Terabithia that is only accessible by swinging over a stream on a nearby rope. Though Jess and Leslie may be considered outcasts by their classmates, their adventures in Terabithia find the pair doing battle against the dreaded Dark Master and his malevolent creatures while plotting revenge against the schoolyard bullies. Now, thanks to his adventures in Terabithia and his friendship with Leslie, Jess finally finds the confidence needed to stand tall and be himself

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, 'Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia

programme.desc: Relive the action from the 2015 Goodyear Cotton Classic from AT&T Stadium in Arlington, Texas, a game which paved the way for Alabama's fourth football championship in six years. All the thrilling catches, runs and tackles from the Crimson Tide's dominating victory over the Big Ten champion Michigan State Spartans are included in this game footage, which includes an MVP performance from cornerback Cyrus Jones and highlight-reel carries by Heisman Trophy-winning running back Derrick Henry. The postgame trophy presentation is also included

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: Living with Predators (Conservation). This final episode of the series visits the frontline of the conflict with the world's top predators, meeting the scientists fighting to save them. Crossing five continents and combining landmark natural history footage with real-life human drama, it checks the pulse of the earth's iconic animals, including lions, tigers, polar bears and blue whales(n)

programme.title: The Hunt

programme.title: Planet Earth: The Hunt

programme.title: Planet Earth: The Hunt

programme.title: Planet Earth: The Hunt

programme.title: Planet Earth: The Hunt

programme.title: Doctor Who

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Chain of Command, Part I. As relations between the Federation and the Cardassians deteriorate, Picard resigns his command of the Enterprise to lead a secret mission with Worf and Crusher. Part 1 of two. Capt. Jellico: Ronny Cox. Gul Lemec: John Durbin. Gul Madred: David Warner. Adm. Nechayev: Natalija Nogulich(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Chain of Command, Part II. Part two of two. The Cardassians torture Picard to make him reveal important Federation information, but Captain Jellico refuses to launch a rescue mission. Riker reacts angrily and is relieved of his post, causing further friction between himself and the Enterprise crew(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Ship in a Bottle. Legendary villain Professor Moriarty is accidentally recreated and proceeds to wreak havoc aboard the Enterprise(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Heart of Glory. The new U.S.S. Enterprise and its crew boldly go where no man has gone before. Lt. Worf's loyalty to the Starfleet is tested when two Klingon fugitives take over the Enterprise(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Arsenal of Freedom. Cadaverous character actor Vincent Schiavelli guest stars as the peddler in this Next Generation installment, which originally aired April 16, 1988. While searching for the missing space vessel U.S.S. Drake on the planet Minos, Captain Picard and Dr. Crusher vanish from sight. With Giordi LaForge left in charge, the Enterprise 's away team must contend with a computerized super weapon, capable of wiping out virtually the entire Federation. "The Arsenal of Freedom" was scripted by Richard Manning and Hans Beimler, from a story by Maurice Hurley and Robert Lewin(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Symbiosis. The new U.S.S. Enterprise and its crew boldly go where no man has gone before. While studying magnetic changes in the Delos system's sun, the Enterprise receives a distress call(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Skin of Evil. While piloting the Enterprise 's shuttlecraft, Deanna Troi crash lands on Vagra 2. She is promptly taken captive by Armus (Mark McChesney), a sadistic creature capable of altering its shape at will. Taking great delight in tormenting the rescue team, Armus causes the death of Lt. Tasha Yar. The anger and outrage engendered by this tragedy ends up hoisting Armus on his own petard. A truly pivotal episode, "Skin of Evil" was written by old Outer Limits hand Joseph Stefano and Hannah Louise Shearer and was first telecast on April 30, 1988(n)

programme.title: Drive
programme.desc: Stylish action crime drama set in Los Angeles about a driver who works for the Hollywood cinema industry during the day and for criminals at night. Behind the wheel, 'Driver' is in control, whether of a getaway car, a movie stunt vehicle or just cruising LA's streets by night. However, the laconic young mechanic allows his involvement with attractive neighbour Irene to lead him into conflict with local crime bosses and the consequences are messy(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Heart of Glory. The new U.S.S. Enterprise and its crew boldly go where no man has gone before. Lt. Worf's loyalty to the Starfleet is tested when two Klingon fugitives take over the Enterprise(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Arsenal of Freedom. Cadaverous character actor Vincent Schiavelli guest stars as the peddler in this Next Generation installment, which originally aired April 16, 1988. While searching for the missing space vessel U.S.S. Drake on the planet Minos, Captain Picard and Dr. Crusher vanish from sight. With Giordi LaForge left in charge, the Enterprise 's away team must contend with a computerized super weapon, capable of wiping out virtually the entire Federation. "The Arsenal of Freedom" was scripted by Richard Manning and Hans Beimler, from a story by Maurice Hurley and Robert Lewin(n)
